forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 48. South southeast wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely after 10am. Partly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early hours, Downtown San Francisco rests under a blanket of clarity, the night sky revealing its mysteries while hints of dawn begin to edge in. Current temperatures hover gently in the mid-forties, a cool embrace that tempts only a light jacket, ideal for a leisurely stroll along the city’s many breeze-kissed streets. As the morning unfolds, expect the weather to shift; rain will likely arrive after 10 a.m., painting the skyline with muted shades while temperatures drift toward the mid-fifties, a soft reminder that autumn is upon us.

Despite the anticipation of midday showers, the early hours present an opportunity for a quiet café visit, where the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingles with the warmth of conversation. As clouds gather, the allure of the city’s charms reveals itself—a hidden gem found in the company of friends sharing stories or perhaps a solitary moment with a book. Dress in layers; a light sweater will serve you well as the winds carry whispers of the coming rain, allowing you to embrace the cozy ambience of this vibrant city. As you sip your beverage, enjoy the transient beauty of a San Francisco morning, knowing the day promises the possibility of a soft drizzle that may just enhance your afternoon.
